name: Unstable Realm
description:
Something strange is happening in this world, and it seems to originate from the World Tree. Go on an adventure as a slime with very cool sunglasses and see what happened over there.

This game was submitted for the Godot Wild Jam #49 (using the full two weeks). This is also my first game jam so I hope you enjoy this little game I made.

Controls:
Move left: W / left arrow
Move right: D / right arrow
Jump: A / up arrow / Z
Double jump (cool mode only): jump while in the air
Dash (cool mode only): Ctrl / X
These are the default controls but they are remappable.
